Birthdate Skill Helper Please fill missing sections Gender Man Woman My Profile Logout Left Brain Right Brain Point Left Dream Addiction Anxiety Controlling location service Started writing to file Right Can not save data, check internet connection
Eyes open, concentrate, green is good, red is bad Eyes open, concentrate to learn the letters Connected to EPOC+ User removed Could be No Yes Location service enabled File service enabled Controlling BLE connection Application can not work without these permissions
Bluetooth should be opened for connecting to EPOC+ Stopped writing to file Learning Difficulty Excitement https://s3-us-east-2.amazonaws.com/atbprod/EN/ https://s3-us-east-2.amazonaws.com/atbprod/ses4/ Recording continues... Session There is not enough data for summary Please consult your doctor before using this application, HMS A.Ş. explicitly disclaims all claims and liabilities arising out of the use of this application. The application is ongoing clinical trials and no side effects has been reported to date.

Gender Session Maximum session This report is not a medical report, it only provides information about the slow brain signals read during a session. Please consult your doctor for medical diagnose.
This report\'s price is 29 TL and you can pay with your credit car.
Activity Number Session requested is bigger than available Show Report Activity Read protocol Speak protocol Clever and hyper protocol Spatial protocol Clever protocol Attention deficit Learning disability Uses left brain Uses right brain Gifted person Norm Data Please check your connection User created Save Profile updated successfuly Close your eyes and relax. The more you relax the more you hear sounds
Open Payment Page You must make payment to continue using the application.
You can make the payment from the Auto Train Brain website and continue to use the application.

Auto Train Brain Rakam Temizle Bir rakam yazın Çizimi yorumlayamadım: %s Spell
//tunc and beyza
Let\'s Learn My Family PLAY PLAY Parent_Page
First Fragment Second Fragment Hello first fragment Hello second fragment. Arg: %1$s Name Choose Photo Save Relative Add Relative Child Parent Find Your Family Let\'s Learn My Family Learn LEARN Let\'s learn my family add new relative Check relatives list Result Fınısh Congratulations! Delete Relatıve Result: 0 / 10 Family members Update Photo Set Relative Learn Your Family Parent Settings Reports Relative Saved Relative Updated At least 4 relatives needed At least 1 relatives needed Please Enter a Name Please Upload a Photo Relative Deleted You need to work harder! You can do better! You are doing great! Congratulations! Relative degree Emotion Set Family Emotion Add Family Emotion Family Emotions Family Emotions Find Emotions Learn Your Family\'s Emotions delete Who is it?
Can you choose the emotion in the photo from the options below? Points: Highest Score: Time Taken: Choose Emotion Category Tests Learning Human Face Cartoon Characters Emojis Next Happy Sad Excited Fearful Cheerful Anxious Angry Bored Disgusted Thinking Selected Exit Test ? Do you want to exit test ?" Yes No Human Emotion Test Cartoon Emotion Test Smiley Surprised Scared Upset Normal Furious Emoji Emotion Test Shy Grumpy Sick Game Over Restart Test Homepage Learning Page Happy Emotion Nervous Hungry Alex is feeling happy today. To show happy, \nSmiling face \nBursting with joy \nEyes wide open and corners of mouth \nslightly raised. When will you happy? When Playing in Park With Family Jack is very excited now. To show excited, \nJumping for joy \nSmile a mile wide \nUnable to sit still \nCheering. When will you feel excited? When I dance When I go to beach Jim is so angry now. To show angry, \nRed face \nNostrils enlarged \nFrown eyebrows \nTeeth clenched and gritted. When will you feel angry? When I lose the game When nobody understands me Mark is feeling sad today. To show sadness, \nTears streaming down the face \nShoulders slumped \nThe corners of mouth go down \nTrembling voice. When will you feel sad? When I am alone When I cant go out because its raining John is so hungry right now. To show hungry, \nGrowling Stomach \nFeeling weak \nLow on energy \nUnable to focus. When will you feel hungry? When I wake up early in the morning When I dont eat for a long time Alice is feeling nervous. To show nervous, \nSweaty palms or hands \nRasing heartbeat \nBiting fingernails \nStuttering speech. When will you feel nervous? When I give a speech in a crowded place When I dont understand something Katy feels shy right now. To show shyness, \nUncomfortably quiet \nLooking down \nSpeaking softly \nBlushing. When will you feel shy? When I talk to my friend When people talking in groups Emily feels sick lately. To show sickness, \nStuffy nose \nRed and sleepy eyes \nSneezing and coughing \nLooks tired. When will you feel sick? When I feel dizzy When I feel stomachache Emma is feeling bored now. To show boredness, \nCouldnt keep from yawning \nBlank stare \nEyes squint \nEyes dive far When will you feel bored? When I play alone When I eat alone
Hello How are you? What is your name? My name is.. Fine, thank you Good bye Socialize Family Faces Emotions Choose the correct one Read Family Emotions Enter values
